sentences.english: Precise design of complete machine, compact conformation, handiness and simplicity.

sentences.english: Aseptically pass not less than 10 pathway volumes of Fluid D through each device tested.

sentences.english: This is basically a one-step operation.
sentences.chinese: 這基本上是一個單步操作。

sentences.english: In addition to governance concerns, this part discusses staffing and portal operations.
sentences.chinese: 除管理問題外，本部分還討論員工管理和門戶操作。

sentences.english: The heat source for evaporation may be Iow pressure steam or surplus heat steam.
sentences.chinese: 蒸發操作的熱源可採用低壓蒸汽或廢熱蒸汽。
那麼這個操作是在做比較。

sentences.english: The tools of media will become more easy to use and more affordable.

sentences.english: The axis of rotation and its support are part of the central pedestal.
sentences.chinese: 旋轉軸和它的支撐結構是中央操作檯的一部分。

sentences.english: While thiol method was simple but much more time costing for reaction.
sentences.chinese: 巰基法操作較爲簡單，但所需的反應時間較長。

sentences.english: Which would have a bunch of operations, like, I won't go into what they might be.
sentences.chinese: 他們會有一些這樣那樣的操作，我不打算細講。

sentences.english: A novel two-phase model for the fluidized bed of polyethylene with condensed mode operation was proposed.
sentences.chinese: 建立了氣相法聚乙烯冷凝模式操作反應器的兩相模型。

sentences.english: Each operating system makes its own unique demands on available memory resources.
sentences.chinese: 每個操作系統都有自己對可用內存資源的獨特需求。

sentences.english: In the meantime, most of the kinks have been worked out.
sentences.chinese: 與此同時，操作指南的大部分內容也已經做出來了。

sentences.english: Reevaluate the operation task of the operators and do not cause changes to the process flow.
sentences.chinese: 重新平衡操作工的作業含量，對過程流程不引起更改。
